author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...PRISCILLA CONTINUES TO STRENGTHEN... ...HEAVY RAINS AND GUSTY WINDS LIKELY OVER PARTS OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO TODAY...
summary: ...PRISCILLA CONTINUES TO STRENGTHEN... ...HEAVY RAINS AND GUSTY WINDS LIKELY OVER PARTS OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO TODAY... As of 2:00 AM MST Mon Oct 06 the center of Priscilla was located near 17.2, -107.3 with movement NNW at 5 mph. The minimum central pressure was 977 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Priscilla (EP1/EP162025)
